title: test_create_sibling.test_replace_and_relative_sshpath failures on Travis

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
`test_create_sibling.test_replace_and_relative_sshpath` had failures in two recent PRs (#4737, #4738) that shouldn't have anything to do with that test.

```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.distribution.tests.test_create_sibling.test_replace_and_relative_sshpath(False,)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 721, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 721, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python3.7.1/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/distribution/tests/test_create_sibling.py", line 584, in check_replace_and_relative_sshpath
    eq_(len(logs_post), len(logs_prior) + 1)
AssertionError: 3 != 4
```

https://travis-ci.org/github/datalad/datalad/jobs/708744165#L1973
https://travis-ci.org/github/datalad/datalad/jobs/708744168#L1976
https://travis-ci.org/github/datalad/datalad/jobs/708748592#L1979
